content: cm on 6 mm needles then change to 7 mm needle working another 5 10 cm bind off loosely using the purl 2 together bind off as above if you wish to work the collar flat use removeable stitch markers to mark where your starting of the side seam will be pick up your stitches with the right side facing and work in stocking stitch as above and then use mattress stitch and seam with the reverse stitching stitch facing sew in all ends give it a steam and enjoy variations if you are wishing just to do colours at the front edges as pictured below then knit your beginning and ends in mirroring reverse order if you are right side dominant and wear the sewn shoulder seam on the right you will be working the poncho from cast on edge which is back to front as it is worn l ink for german short row double stitch https //www youtube com/watch v=cmxpjuto3wi ©2023 maree buscke pg 2
